TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeViewCancelEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 、、 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the , , , and events of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何更改的折叠状态， 以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，所有节点均折叠，并向事件添加一个处理程序 。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added to the event. 接下来，展开所有节点。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件处理程序确定给定节点是否包含已选中的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果某个节点没有选中的子级，则会取消该节点的展开。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 若要在单击节点旁边的加号时允许正常的节点扩展，则 会删除事件处理程序。In order to allow normal node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行为还可通过处理事件来实现 ，如该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 有关完整的示例，请参阅 参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1/CPP/treeviewshowcheckednodes1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1/CS/treeviewshowcheckednodes1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1/VB/treeviewshowcheckednodes1.vb#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified tree node, a value specifying whether the event is to be canceled, and the type of tree view action that raised the event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `TreeView1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TreeView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#626](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#626)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#626](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#626)]

summary.span: 获取要选中、展开、折叠或选择的树节点。

span.span: Gets the tree node to be checked, expanded, collapsed, or selected.

value.span: 要选中、展开、折叠或选择的 。

span.span: The to be checked, expanded, collapsed, or selected.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何更改的折叠状态， 以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，所有节点均折叠，并向事件添加一个处理程序 。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added to the event. 接下来，展开所有节点。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件处理程序确定给定节点是否包含已选中的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果某个节点没有选中的子级，则会取消该节点的展开。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 若要在单击节点旁边的加号时允许正常的节点扩展，则 会删除事件处理程序。In order to allow normal node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行为还可通过处理事件来实现 ，如该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 有关完整的示例，请参阅 参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic.
